website_summaries.verdict: No fancy features, just fast temperature readings – if this is what you need, chances are you will appreciate what AcuRite has to offer.
pros: Not only is it straightforward to use and simplistic in its design, but this model offers instant temperature readings that cooks love
Has a compact and safe design – great for grilling
cons: Like other meat thermometers, it can be inaccurate
Comes with only a one-year limited warranty

customer_reviews.title: instant,my ass!!
customer_reviews.text: not instant !! ,requires 20-30 seconds to read temp...how can you call that instant??? my dial type analog old school (made in USA) is faster,but small dial pocket type hard to read for old eyes plus the dial type has glass lens ...you can leave in meat on bbq for a while.. and close lid on bbq.......can not do that with this plastic chinese junk...needs a lighted read out so can see @ night bbq..oh well what can one expect for a cheapo chinese.. P O S
customer_reviews.author: john wunder

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I cook a lot, indoors and out and am always conscious of items being done too a tee. I am a retired chef and still cook for my family every day as everyone else still works outside the home. The thermometer works very well and takes the guesswork out of doing meat on the grill or in the oven. Its wide range of temperatures is well suited to deep frying or doing a steak. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Not for grilling
customer_reviews.text: Do not try to use this for checking meat on an open grill. The back battery cover fell off mine and quickly melted and burned up in the hot grill. I taped over the batteries to keep them in place. Then the plastic housing around the metal probe started melting as I was checking the temperature of meat on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: AllenS10

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 6 months then broke
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it was great. After 5-1/2 months and aprox. 24 uses, it displays "LLL". Installed new battery but still same display. Not worth the postage to send in under warranty. Would not recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Thios is the second one I have owned. I gave the first one away to someone who admired it. This thermometer is a must when smoking meats to double check for doneness. Easy and accurate. The probe folds away so it won't get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Mullet Master

customer_reviews.title: spend more or buy many
customer_reviews.text: worked well while it lasted---10 months and gave up the ghost--reads all "LLLL's-----used probably 10 times in 10 months---not a very good track record---get what you pay for in the end ---I guess
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Jazina

customer_reviews.title: gives the inside information
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had gotten this much sooner, it makes grilling so much easier, tells the internal temp in with very little wait time.
customer_reviews.author: rojca

customer_reviews.title: Too slow
customer_reviews.text: This unit takes a while to settle on a temperature - 5 to 10 seconds I guess. It's definitely slower than a previous one we had of a different brand. Not particularly happy with this one. Too slow.
customer_reviews.author: tjp_hhp

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: Like the small size. Not too handy with thick steaks as grease splatters tend to cover it. Cleaning it off could be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Krake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly. Best digital thermometer I ever had. Use it to check meat on the grill. Instant read, nice size and curved shape, easy to clean. I also like that it has recommended temps for food printed on the back as a reminder.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works well, beeps when up to temperature - in seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Toby Gooden

customer_reviews.title: Good price and very servicable item.= update
customer_reviews.text: Got a good price on it and it works just fine. What else to say? 10-20-18 update. Made it about 3 years and now has the LLL.L on the display instead temperature. Time to shop for another option.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: good or better than i have seen anyware great product,just what i needed for my kitchen i'm always conserned that my meat is not done enough for my guests now i know for sure great tool for anyone who cooks alot thanks guys.
customer_reviews.author: karl hubert

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for a month or so now and am very happy with it. Much better than a cheaper instant read thermometer I returned.
customer_reviews.author: From Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking aid
customer_reviews.text: This is my third of these...they are GREAT! Easy to use and very useful for testing your meat/egg/anything cooking temperature. Well made and easy to see/use.
customer_reviews.author: David Enright

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable, bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for the hubs after quite a bit of research; bought a separate brand in case this one was not as good as reported given the lower price. This one turned out to be a favorite instead of the higher priced instant read.
customer_reviews.author: KGray

customer_reviews.title: Fast & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer reads fast and beeps when it is at max temp so you know this is the actual temp of the food.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Rivette

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: My son had one and I loved the compact size and the fact that it has the temps for meats written right on it so I got my own.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bursey

customer_reviews.title: My favorite meat thermometer!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s my favorite!! The only one I’ve used for the last 5+ years. It’s accurate, easy to read & clean and easy to store!!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but one design flaw
customer_reviews.text: The real panel which needs to be removed to change batteries does not stay attached very well. It keeps falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Always use a thermometer to cook
customer_reviews.text: Love this accurate thermometer. A must for perfect chicken on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Kostoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No mistakes on your steaks. For the price you can't beat it. Would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz (Viera Florida)

customer_reviews.title: Itis easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I'm not real pleased that we cannot lock tthe probe in place
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Tiley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was needing. Fast, accurate, and not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jawjadawg1950

customer_reviews.title: Works great it's accurate easy to read and the bell is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great it's accurate easy to read and the bell is a great added feature especially for us older folks with glasses the bell rings pull it out of what ever you are cooking and there is the temp. and it is in both F. and C. great tool
customer_reviews.author: Peter Domonchuk

customer_reviews.title: What a great Mother's Day gift
customer_reviews.text: What a great Mother's Day gift. We were so glad to find something so practical available at a good price, that has been such a pleasant gift for a dear mother!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these and one does not work. Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and easy thermometer
customer_reviews.text: We used it and loved it, it is fast and accurate. Our first roast was perfect when the thermometer showed the right temperature.
customer_reviews.author: cees kist

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for nearly a year, but the constant opening and closing of the temperature probe eventually broke the wire connection to the body of the thermometer and it stopped working. I would not recommentd it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Susan

customer_reviews.title: These units work great to help trouble shot our home HVAC system when ...
customer_reviews.text: These units work great to help trouble shot our home HVAC system when there art issues that crop up during season changes. Last fall the AC unit started freezing up. They allowed us to see that there was only a small temperature differential between the input air to the AC unit and the output temperature. Turned out that the system was low on Freon and was not properly operating. Had someone come and add some Freon and all of the problems went away. Now I use them to be sure system is always operating correctly.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: It Works Well But It's Too Easy to Turn On
customer_reviews.text: This works just fine, but if you throw it in a drawer full of kitchen gadgets, the ON button will likely get pressed at some point and the batteries will be dead when you want to use it. Hang it on a hook somewhere and there are no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose McNibble

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase, dangerous to open
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I couldn’t test the quality of this thermometer in that I couldn’t access the battery compartment. Wound up stabbing my thumb in the process. Poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: pabo

customer_reviews.title: Every cook should have an Instant Thermometer.
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen tool, well priced, and very accurate. Easy to use, easy to read. Can set for Fahrenheit or for Celsius with a single press of a button.
customer_reviews.author: EmElDee4

customer_reviews.title: So far, Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Affordable accurate readings, but a little slow in achieving final temp reading (what did I expect for 12 bucks?). Package said it had a hold function, but darned if I can figure out how, and instructions never mentioned it. AAA batteries are affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl White

customer_reviews.title: This button is too easily depressed. Should have designed thermometer with a smaller
customer_reviews.text: 0Seems to work well. Have one issue with C/F button. This button is too easily depressed. Should have designed thermometer with a smaller, non-obstrusive button...how many times do you want to read Celsius in the US or Fahrenheit in the rest of the world!
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, easy, fast, and accurate -
customer_reviews.text: I use kitchen thermometers a lot, and I wanted a reliable digital. This one was on the low end of the price curve, but I could not imagine what made the expensive ones any better. So far this digital thermometer is working out very well and it wont break your appliance budget.
customer_reviews.author: cheue444

customer_reviews.title: purchased as a gift, recipient thinks it is great, just ordered one for my own kitchen as
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift, recipient thinks it is great, just ordered one for my own kitchen as well.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, a wee bit slower read time than "Instant", but good !..........
customer_reviews.author: BigDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a chef!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this thermometer. Nicely made and shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Bullock

customer_reviews.title: ... delivered before i expected so that is a pluVery easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered before i expected so that is a pluVery easy to use, campact and smooth transition between F and C.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not heat resistant
customer_reviews.text: Plastic near probe is starting to melt from grill heat. If I can hold end of the thermometer over the meat/ grill and my hand doesn't cook the thermometer should not show signs of melting
customer_reviews.author: outdoor guy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for - but it works
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy

customer_reviews.title: after several months of usage it has disappointed me. I used to rely of this unit ...
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to write this rating because I wanted to actually try the product first. When I first started using this thermometer it worked outstandingly (if that's a word). But, after several months of usage it has disappointed me. I used to rely of this unit daily now I'm almost scared to pull it out in front of anyone.
customer_reviews.author: TravllinMan

customer_reviews.title: No more over or under cooked meat!
customer_reviews.text: This meat thermometer works great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: AcuRite, Multicolor Digital Instant Read Thermometer with Folding Probe, 5" L, 3.3"
product_meta.description: The AcuRite digital instant read thermometer with foldable probe provides accurate, reliable temperature readings, allowing you to monitor internal food temperature. Stainless steel probe folds and locks into place for safe pocket-size portability and convenient storage. Insert the probe into the thickest part of the meat and the thermometer measures the temperature within seconds. Powered by 1 AAA battery (not included). NSF safety certified. One-Year limited warranty. It's more than accurate, it's AcuRite.
feature_bullets: Pocket-Sized thermometer with foldable probe that locks into base for portability and storage
Quick, accurate readout of inner food temperature within seconds
Usda recommended temperatures printed on handle
Commercial quality stainless steel thermometer probe. Dimensions: 5inch H x 2.5 inch W x 1 inch D, Probe Dimensions: 3.3 inch
Measures temperatures from -40 to 450 degrees Fahrenheit (-40 to 232 degrees Celsius)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars112 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
